Release Notes
You are about to witness history, as this has never been done before. The initial
release had 27 glitchy frames (at 1:51:11) due to a bad source. It must have been
the same source that BLOW used,  as it was later removed from the private torrent
tracker I got it from. Conclusion: BLOW uses sources from p2p. Haha, busted!

I could have just made another rip from a good source, but I can't expect people
to download the entire release again.  So, I bring you this tiny patch that will
actually replace the glitchy frames and give you a flawless release, without the
need to download the entire file again. Like I've said: This has never been done
before.

How to Apply
1.) Download the actual release
2.) Move all the files from this torrent to the same folder
    where the .mkv file is located
3.) Run the batch file (fix-the.martian-nezu.bat)
4.) Follow the on-screen instructions.
5.) You're done. Now enjoy. And have a happy New Year!
